title: The Fate of Us
description: Maddie PriceWhen I was younger, I made a wish on a star to find true love. Unfortunately, I didn’t know what love was until the boy across the street stole my heart then disappeared from my life.Now Preston is back. He’s older, sexier, more charming, and he’s trying harder than ever to be my friend again. I still see traces of the old Preston, my best friend, but can I look beyond the hurt he caused to give him another chance at friendship? I know one small touch from him and I will cave, causing every part of me to shatter. I had lived a life without Preston- I had a choice to make. Was I ready to stop fighting against everything I’d always wanted?
author: Brooke   Parker
